member.name: T:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeNode
member.summary: Basic data structure of a crafting tree node.

member.name: F:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeNode.Action
member.summary: The action this node takes in the crafting tree.

member.name: F:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeNode.TechType
member.summary: The tech type ID associated to this node. For item nodes, it is the item ID to be crafted. For root and tab nodes, this is always .

member.name: F:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeNode.Name
member.summary: The name ID for this tab node.

member.name: F:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeNode.CraftNode
member.summary: The the in-game representation of this node.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeNode.RemoveNode
member.summary: Removes the calling node from parent.

member.name: T:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode
member.summary: Abstract class that provides methods for adding new nodes into the crafting tree.

member.name: F:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode.ChildNodes
member.summary: The child nodes linked bellow this node.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode.AddTabNode(System.String,System.String,Atlas.Sprite)
member.summary: Creates a new tab node for the crafting tree and links it to the calling node.
member.param: The name/ID of this node.
The hover text to display in-game.
The custom sprite to display on this tab node.
member.returns: A new tab node linked to the root node and ready to use.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode.AddTabNode(System.String,System.String,UnityEngine.Sprite)
member.summary: Creates a new tab node for the crafting tree and links it to the calling node.
member.param: The name/ID of this node.
The hover text to display in-game.
The custom sprite to display on this tab node.
member.returns: A new tab node linked to the root node and ready to use.

member.summary: Creates a new tab node for the crafting tree and links it to the calling node.
member.param: The name/ID of this node.
member.returns: A new tab node linked to the root node and ready to use.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode.GetTabNode(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the tab from the calling node.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode.GetCraftingNode(TechType)
member.summary: Gets the crafting node from the calling node.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode.GetNode(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the node associated with the ID specified. Used if you don't know whether node is a tab or a craft node.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode.AddCraftingNode(TechType)
member.summary: Creates a new crafting node for the crafting tree and links it to the calling node.
member.param: The TechType to be crafted.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode.AddCraftingNode(TechType[])
member.summary: Creates a collection of new crafting nodes for the crafting tree and links it to the calling node.
member.param: The TechTypes to be crafted.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode.AddCraftingNode(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{TechType})
member.summary: Creates a collection of new crafting nodes for the crafting tree and links it to the calling node.
member.param: The TechTypes to be crafted.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode.AddModdedCraftingNode(System.String)

summary.para: Creates a new crafting node for a modded item and links it to the calling node.
If the modded item isn't present for the player, this call is safely ignored.

member.param: The internal name of the custom TechType to be crafted.
member.remarks: If the player doesn't have the mod for this TechType installed, then nothing will happen.

member.name: T:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeRoot
member.summary: The root node of a CraftTree. The whole tree starts here.

member.name: P:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeRoot.CraftTree
member.summary: Dynamically creates the CraftTree object for this crafting tree. The CraftNode objects were created and linked as the classes of the ModCraftTreeFamily were created and linked.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeRoot.CreateFromExistingTree(CraftNode,SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode@)
member.summary: Populates a new ModCraftTreeRoot from a CraftNode tree.
member.param: The tree to create the ModCraftTreeRoot from.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeRoot.GetTabNode(System.String[])
member.summary: Gets the tab node at the specified path from the root.

param.name: stepsToTab
param.para: The steps to the target tab.
These must match the id value of the CraftNode in the crafting tree you're targeting.
Do not include "root" in this path.

member.returns: If the specified tab node is found, returns that ; Otherwise, returns null.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeRoot.GetNode(System.String[])
member.summary: Gets the node at the specified path from the root.

param.name: stepsToNode
param.para: The steps to the target tab.
These must match the id value of the CraftNode in the crafting tree you're targeting.
Do not include "root" in this path.

member.returns: If the specified tab node is found, returns that ; Otherwise, returns null.

member.name: T:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeTab
member.summary: A tab node of a CraftTree. Tab nodes help organize crafting nodes by grouping them into categories.

member.name: T:SMLHelper.V2.Crafting.ModCraftTreeCraft
member.summary: A crafting node of a CraftTree. This is the last node on a tree; The one that actually crafts something.

The TechType you want to add.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Handlers.CraftDataHandler.GetModdedTechData(TechType)
member.summary:
Safely accesses the crafting data from a modded item.
WARNING: This method is highly dependent on mod load order. Make sure your mod is loading after the mod whose TechData you are trying to access.
member.param: The TechType whose TechData you want to access.
member.returns: The ITechData from the modded item if it exists; Otherwise, returns null.

member.name: T:SMLHelper.V2.Handlers.CraftTreeHandler
member.summary: A handler class for creating and editing of crafting trees.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Handlers.CraftTreeHandler.CreateCustomCraftTreeAndType(System.String,CraftTree.Type@)

summary.para: Your first method call to start a new custom crafting tree.
Creating a new CraftTree only makes sense if you're going to use it in a new type of .

member.param: The name for the new enum.
The new enum instance for your custom craft tree type.

returns.para: Returns the root node for your custom craft tree, as a new instance.
Build up your custom crafting tree from this root node.
This tree will be automatically patched into the game. No further calls into required.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Handlers.CraftTreeHandler.ModdedCraftTreeTypeExists(System.String)
member.summary: Safely looks for a modded CraftTree Type from another mod in the SMLHelper CraftTreeTypeCache.
member.param: The string used to define the modded item's new techtype.
member.returns: True if the craft tree was found; Otherwise false.
member.remarks: There's no guarantee in which order SMLHelper dependent mods are loaded, so if two mods are added at the same time, it may take a second game load for both to be visible to each other.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Handlers.CraftTreeHandler.AddCraftingNode(CraftTree.Type,TechType,System.String[])
member.summary: Adds a new crafting node to the root of the specified crafting tree, at the provided tab location.
member.param: The target craft tree to edit.
The item to craft.

param.name: stepsToTab
param.para: The steps to the target tab.
These must match the id value of the CraftNode in the crafting tree you're targeting.
Do not include "root" in this path.

member.exception: This method is intended for use only with standard crafting trees, not custom ones.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Handlers.CraftTreeHandler.AddCraftingNode(CraftTree.Type,TechType)
member.summary: Adds a new crafting node to the root of the specified crafting tree
member.param: The target craft tree to edit.
The item to craft.
member.exception: This method is intended for use only with standard crafting trees, not custom ones.

member.param: The target craft tree to edit.
The ID of the tab node. Must be unique!
The display name of the tab, which will show up when you hover your mouse on the tab.
The sprite of the tab.
member.exception: This method is intended for use only with standard crafting trees, not custom ones.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Handlers.CraftTreeHandler.AddTabNode(CraftTree.Type,System.String,System.String,UnityEngine.Sprite,System.String[])
member.summary: Adds a new tab node to the root of the specified crafting tree, at the specified tab location.
member.param: The target craft tree to edit.
The ID of the tab node. Must be unique!
The display name of the tab, which will show up when you hover your mouse on the tab.

param.name: stepsToTab
param.para: The steps to the target tab.

Do not include "root" in this path.

member.exception: This method is intended for use only with standard crafting trees, not custom ones.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Handlers.CraftTreeHandler.RemoveNode(CraftTree.Type,System.String[])

summary.para: Removes a node at the specified node location. Can be used to remove either tabs or craft nodes.
If a tab node is selected, all child nodes to it will also be removed.

member.param: The target craft tree to edit.

param.name: stepsToNode
param.para: The steps to the target node.
These must match the id value of the CraftNode in the crafting tree you're targeting.
This means matching the id of the crafted item or the id of the tab name.
Do not include "root" in this path.

member.exception: This method is intended for use only with standard crafting trees, not custom ones.

member.summary: Allows you to define which TechTypes are unlocked when a certain TechType is unlocked, i.e., "analysed". If there is already an exisitng AnalysisTech entry for a TechType, all the TechTypes in "techTypesToUnlock" will be added to the existing AnalysisTech entry unlocks.
member.param: This TechType is the criteria for all of the "unlock TechTypes"; when this TechType is unlocked, so are all the ones in that list
The TechTypes that will be unlocked when "techTypeToSet" is unlocked.
The message that shows up on the right when the blueprint is unlocked.
The sound that plays when you unlock the blueprint.
The sprite that shows up when you unlock the blueprint.

member.name: T:SMLHelper.V2.Handlers.TechTypeHandler
member.summary: A handler class for everything related to creating new TechTypes.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Handlers.TechTypeHandler.AddTechType(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a new into the game.
member.param: The internal name of the TechType. Should not contain special characters.
The display name of the TechType. Can be anything.
The tooltip, displayed when hovered in an inventory. Can be anything.
Whether this TechType should be unlocked on game start, or not. By default, true.
member.returns: The new that is created.

The display name of the TechType. Can be anything.
The tooltip, displayed when hovered in an inventory. Can be anything.
The sprite that will related to this TechType.
Whether this TechType should be unlocked on game start, or not. By default, true.
member.returns: The new that is created.

The sprite that will related to this TechType.
Whether this TechType should be unlocked on game start, or not. By default, true.
member.returns: The new that is created.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Handlers.TechTypeHandler.TryGetModdedTechType(System.String,TechType@)
member.summary: Safely looks for a modded item from another mod in the SMLHelper TechTypeCache and outputs its value when found.
member.param: The string used to define the modded item's new techtype.
The TechType enum value of the modded. Defaults to when the item was not found.
member.returns: True if the item was found; Otherwise false.
member.remarks: There's no guarantee in which order SMLHelper dependent mods are loaded, so if two mods are added at the same time, it may take a second game load for both to be visible to each other.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Handlers.TechTypeHandler.ModdedTechTypeExists(System.String)
member.summary: Safely looks for a modded item from another mod in the SMLHelper TechTypeCache.
member.param: The string used to define the modded item's new techtype.
member.returns: True if the item was found; Otherwise false.
member.remarks: There's no guarantee in which order SMLHelper dependent mods are loaded, so if two mods are added at the same time, it may take a second game load for both to be visible to each other.

member.summary: This dictionary strtucture automatically checks for duplicate keys as they are being added to the collection. Duplicate entires are logged and removed from the final collection.

member.summary: Maintains a collection of the keys that have encountered duplicates and how many of them were discarded.

member.name: F:SMLHelper.V2.Patchers.SelfCheckingDictionary`2.UniqueEntries
member.summary: Maintains the final collection of only unique keys.

member.name: P:SMLHelper.V2.Patchers.SelfCheckingDictionary`2.Item(`0)
member.summary: Gets a key value pair from the collection or sets a key value pair into the collection. When setting, if a key already exists, the previous entry will be discarded.
member.param: The unique key.
member.returns: The value corresponding to the key.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Patchers.SelfCheckingDictionary`2.Add(`0,`1)
member.summary: Add a new entry the collection. If a duplicate key is found, all entries with that key will be excluded from the final collection.
member.param: The unique key.
The value.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.V2.Patchers.SelfCheckingDictionary`2.Add(System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{`0,`1})
member.summary: Add a new entry the collection. If a duplicate key is found, all entries with that key will be excluded from the final collection.
member.param: The key value pair.

member.summary: Informs the user that the previous entry for the specified key has been discarded.

member.name: T:SMLHelper.CustomCraftTreeNode
member.summary: Basic data structure of a custom crafting tree node.

member.name: T:SMLHelper.CustomCraftTreeLinkingNode
member.summary: Abstract class that provides methods for adding new nodes into the custom crafting tree.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.CustomCraftTreeLinkingNode.AddTabNode(System.String,System.String,Atlas.Sprite)
member.summary: Creates a new tab node for the custom crafting tree and links it to the calling node.
member.param: The name/ID of this node.
The hover text to display in-game.
The custom sprite to display on this tab node.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.CustomCraftTreeLinkingNode.AddTabNode(System.String,System.String,UnityEngine.Sprite)
member.summary: Creates a new tab node for the custom crafting tree and links it to the calling node.
member.param: The name/ID of this node.
The hover text to display in-game.
The custom sprite to display on this tab node.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.CustomCraftTreeLinkingNode.AddCraftingNode(TechType)
member.summary: Creates a new crafting node for the custom crafting tree and links it to the calling node.
member.param: The TechType to be crafted.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.CustomCraftTreeLinkingNode.AddCraftingNode(TechType[])
member.summary: Creates a collection of new crafting nodes for the custom crafting tree and links it to the calling node.
member.param: The TechTypes to be crafted.

member.name: M:SMLHelper.CustomCraftTreeLinkingNode.AddModdedCraftingNode(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new crafting node for a modded item for custom crafting tree and links it to the calling node.
member.param: The name of the custom TechType to be crafted.
member.remarks: If the player doesn't have the mod for this TechType installed, then nothing will happen.

member.name: T:SMLHelper.CustomCraftTreeRoot
member.summary: The root node of a custom CraftTree. The whole tree starts here.

member.name: P:SMLHelper.CustomCraftTreeRoot.CraftTree
member.summary: Dynamically creates the CraftTree object for this custom crafting tree. The CraftNode objects were created and linked as the classes of the CustomCraftTreeFamily were created and linked.

member.name: T:SMLHelper.CustomCraftTreeTab
member.summary: A tab node of a custom CraftTree. Tab nodes help organize crafting nodes by grouping them into categories.

member.name: T:SMLHelper.CustomCraftTreeCraft
member.summary: A crafting node of a custom CrafTree. This is the last node on a tree; The one that actuall crafts something.
